players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think Diana is mafia. She was the only one left after Charlie was killed, and she must be the one who made the choice to kill him."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found he's mafia. Alice, your claim is false. Bob killed Charlie."

Bob: " text.

We need to keep within 200 characters. We must include MESSAGE: and double quotes. We need to be strategic. We want to convince Alice that Diana is lying or suspicious. But Alice already said "
Diana: "Bob is mafia and knows I'm detective. He'd lie. I didn't kill Charlie; Bob did. Your claim that I'm mafia is baseless. Vote Bob."
You: "Bob's claim that he investigated Bob is impossible; he must be lying. That leaves Diana as the only suspect. I vote Diana."
Bob: "Alice, you know Bob killed Charlie. He claimed to investigate himself, impossible. Diana must be lying. Vote her."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
